Text:
Someone Requested This And I Told Him That HR Had Uploaded This One Already He Said It Only Goes Halfway. So I Just Put It Up Anyway.

See..

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6321961/Remember_The_Titans_%5BPSP__iPod__Zune%5D
And By The Way HR Put Up A High-Res Version Of The Dilemma I Put Up A Regular Version. And Besides Uploading Isnt A Competition..

EG ... like I said before, YOU ARE THE MAN!!
Thank you so very much, I requested this and you delivered .. like always.  
And yes, downloading is not a competition, and it never was and never will be so I thank both you and HR for your great work.

@fear ... don't u understand EG's comment .. its right there in black and white man, "the stuff that's already there" isn't working properly ... geeze, chill out man, it's not ur time that he's wasting anyway so chill man, he's doing it voluntarily on his own spare time which is why many of us appreciate his great work.
